title: Undismissable calendar reminders (birthdays)
content: Question (Windows): I have a reminder pop-up for past birthdays from my calendar (synced from a self-hosted Yunohost Nextcloud) that repeatedly alarms despite how often I close the window, and I am unable to snooze or dismiss the reminder. Is there a solve for this?
creator: link+firefox

title: Set up Mozilla as default mail client to use on web sites that say "click here to leave message"
content: When I am on a web site most of the time there is a link used to send an email to their company. How do I configure Thunderbird to be the default email client to write and send my message? Right now Windows Live Mail is the default
creator: reau2468

title: Win10 Thunderbird continues to hang - Often getting Non Responsive and crashes
content:
I have been using Thunderbird for quite some time and over the last few years I have been noticing that the program hangs alot. This happens on ONLY some of my PC's running Thunderbird and I am struggling to understand why as they are all identical, using the same addons, accounts etc.

This happens when we select an email, any email. In some cases, it might hang for 5-15 seconds then load or in other instances, it continues to hang where when we right click the tab in the taskbar and press close, the windows box comes up saying that Thunderbird is not responding.

I have tried using it is safe mode, disabling add-ons, reinstalling it, suring the inbox's are compacted..but nothing

I am sure its something simple, but it really is driving me nuts.

Some information:

I use the global inbox and copy of my settings below.

creator: info10246

title: Screen focus not consistent between mailboxes/users.
content: We are running Thunderbird 115 and encountering an annoying issue. We run two separate mailboxes and always sort by date with most recent at the bottom. It seems that whenever we switch from one mailbox to the other, the focus seems to jump to somewhere in the middle of the message library, rather than the 'bottom'/newest message. We scroll to the bottom, and then switch back again to the other mailbox and find our focus again somewhere in the middle...
creator: mnohel

title: Random enabling of 'Threading'
content: We are running Thunderbird 115 and encountering an annoying issue. Somehow 'threading' keeps getting activated randomly. It is not being manually activated since the 'View' setting is not even normally displayed. We have to keep looking for the setting to turn it off as it is a feature that we do not like to use.
creator: mnohel

title: year_display
content: in the inbox the year is not showing as 2023 its showing as 2566. i am using the laptop in asia but i like to see the date as 2023
creator: rony925

title: Message window moves when I delete a message
content: Since the new update, when I delete a message, the message "window" scrolls and I have to scroll back to where I was. This is very annoying and wastes time. I hope my description makes sense.
creator: mkdeupree

title: Mass Emails
content:
As the Secretary of a sporting club I regularly have to send out mass notifications to around 100 members.

I usually have no problems selecting the members, using BCC then composing and sending the message.

On my last batch after I sent the message the programme took forever to show the message in the "sent" folder and when it did none of the text or addresses was visible so i don't know if the messages were received or not. Around 30 were undeliverable and I resent these in smaller batches using the "to" box instead of the BCC and none came back but, again, the messages in the "sent" box were blank. i 'phoned a couple of the addressees and at least two said they had not received the emails.

Is this some new anti-spam measure you have adopted?


Kindest regards, Colin Ballard 6 November 2023
creator: fluffkin21001

title: Delete Messages on client and leave it on the IMAP server
content:
Hi,

I'm missing the the possibility to delete Messages on one of my clients and leave it on the server. I'm using Thunderbird on my desktop, mostly to save my important emails. Therefore I have installed some filters to delete unimportant mails like newsletter, noreplay@... e.g... Unfortunately I'm not able to read these mails even more on my other client like my mobile. In an older version of Thunderbird was a checkbox for "leave it on the server".. in the latest version this box is gone. Who can help me?

Thanks a lot.
creator: michael.martin1966

title: I cannot see my inboxes as there are too many message tabs at the top. How can I stop these tabs apopearing?
content: I cannot see my inboxes as there are too many message tabs at the top. How can I stop these tabs apopearing?
creator: dareme

title: Mail delle cartelle archivio 2013/2023 sparite
content: Buongiorno, purtroppo ho un problema serio con thunderbird, mi sono accorto da alcuni giorni che le le mail archiviate dal 2013 sino ad oggi 2023 sono sparite, vedo le cartelle 2013/2023 e la cartella principale archivio in corsivo ma non cliccabili, non posso entrarci per aprire le mail archiviate, se metto il mouse sulla cartella 2023 leggo che mi dice che ci sono 43 messaggi e basta, nelle altre leggo 0. Inoltre se provo ad archiviare una qualsiasi e-mail mi esce scritto che loperazione non pu essere eseguita, seguita da una errore. Queste mail sono salvate sul server o sbaglio? Ho pure formattato qualche mese fa e thunderbird mi ha scaricato tutto, mail vecchie e archivi correttamente. Ho provato pure a cancellare laccount e disinstallare thunderbird ma non cambiato nulla.
creator: mikehcl

title: Slow and freezes after the new update 115.4.1 (win10)
content:
Hello, as soon as TB Thunderbird was auto updated to the new version 115.4.1 (64-bit) 2 weeks ago, it keeps freezing randomly but often for several seconds when you click inbox folders from Any Emails I have: Private, Outlook, Yahoo, or Google.

It does also freeze randomly while I write emails or I check other folders. It take so much longer to deal with emails all together.

It tends to do it if the program has been opened recently but also in the midle of the day or while writing emails, for no reasons.

The previous version was also slower but was at least manageable.

What is going on? Any hints or different solutions are appreciated. Best Regards, Chris
creator: theshopbase

title: Come creare scorciatoia per scaricare solo i messaggi di un determinato account
content: Salve, uso Thunderbird per monitorare le mie caselle di posta e avrei bisogno di creare una scorciatoia per controllare se sono presenti nuovi messaggi SOLO per un account specifico. Perch ne ho bisogno? Perch se premo F5 mi scarica la posta di tutti gli account, anche di quelli per i quali ho disattivato il controllo.
creator: frapar

title: After upgrade from Thunderbird 102.15.1 to Thunderbird 115.4.1the traditional view changed and all of my inbox folder disappeared. I would like to restore the traditional view
content: After upgrade from Thunderbird 102.15.1 to Thunderbird 115.4.1 the traditional view changed and all of my inbox folder disappeared. After some view changing some update occurs and as I can understand there is a 'unified view'. I hate such a kind of view, all subfolders are not under the inbox, and I would like to see each of my IMAP mail account with their folders independently as in the traditional view. How to restore the traditional visualization of mail accounts? Please note that I cannot set the menu View folders->All folders (I hoped to restore the traditional visualization in that way...). If I try to set the All folders view, the menu check returns to View->Unified folders any time and I cannot see the traditional view... The only way to return to my tradition IMAP folder visualization is to restore Thunderbird 102.15.1 with a backupped profile. How to restore the traditional view with each IMAP account independent with their inbox, sent, trash and personal subfolders?
creator: janthony2

title: When I change the name in an address book entry, it doesn't get reflected in the message display
content:
I had an address book entry that had an incorrect name in the Name field. This incorrect name was displayed when I was viewing emails associated with that address book entry.

I went into the address book and changed the name field, expecting that the name change would be reflected when viewing the emails associated with that address book entry. The name was still incorrect when looking in the inbox (in the from or correspondents column) and when selecting individual emails.

Is there something else I need to do to get Thunderbird to reflect that the name has been changed?

title: Turn off Messages as list or thread
content:
Thunderbird displays messages as a long list. It never did that before an update, and now I can not find out how to turn that nonsense off! How do I search for a message from a random person and only get one message I choose to view?

title: Filter order changing after quitting Thunderbird
content: I have been getting flooded with a spam blackmail/extortion scheme that has a particular subject line. Although it's correctly tagged by SpamAssassin and goes to my Junk box, it makes sorting through my Junk box for false positives harder. So I set up a filter to recognize the subject line and simply delete it before the SpamAssassin filter runs. However, every time I restart Thunderbird, I find that the filter has moved down to run after the SpamAssassin filter runs, meaning I have dozens of this message sitting in my Junk box again. Why are my filters being reordered?
creator: dajagr
